description: reddish-brown striped wood; "J. Hash" engraved in top of barrel; "WMA" engraved in silver plate inlay on neck; "IH" engraved in gold inlay into top of barrel; floral design engraved on trigger guard and patch box; two dark brown leather straps
medium: Curly stump maple, iron, steel, silver, gold
title: British-style (c. 1750) Flintlock Longrifle
